data.meta_description: The Mannheim Enterprise Panel linked to the Establishment History Panel (MUP-BHP) includes all limited liability companies (GmbH) from the Mannheim Company Panel (MUP) and their permanent establishments throughout Germany that are recorded in the Establishment History Panel (BHP) of the Institute for Employment Research (IAB). The current version (MUP-BHP 1020 v1) covers the time period ...continue reading "Mannheim Enterprise Panel linked to the Establishment History Panel (MUP-BHP) available"
data.text: The Mannheim Enterprise Panel linked to the Establishment History Panel (MUP-BHP) includes all limited liability companies (GmbH) from the Mannheim Company Panel (MUP) and their permanent establishments throughout Germany that are recorded in the Establishment History Panel (BHP) of the Institute for Employment Research (IAB). The current version (MUP-BHP 1020 v1) covers the time period 2010-2020. Further Information.
